meanings.definition: In a way that is not worthy of attention or notice.
meanings.sent1: She unremarkably walked into the room without anyone noticing.
meanings.sent2: He unremarkably completed his homework before dinner.
meanings.sent3: The magician unremarkably pulled a rabbit out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: The sun unremarkably sets in the west every evening.
meanings.sent5: The cat unremarkably napped in the sunbeam.

meanings.definition: In a typical or usual manner.
meanings.sent1: The students unremarkably lined up for recess.
meanings.sent2: She unremarkably wore her favorite blue dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The clown unremarkably juggled rubber chickens at the circus.
meanings.sent4: The flowers unremarkably bloomed in the spring.
meanings.sent5: The clock unremarkably ticked away the minutes.
